thread.title: Ursula Le Guin on fiction vs. 'alternative facts': Letter to the editor
thread.title_full: Ursula Le Guin on fiction vs. 'alternative facts': Letter to the editor

author: Letters to the editor
title: Ursula Le Guin on fiction vs. 'alternative facts': Letter to the editor
text: A recent letter in The Oregonian compares a politician's claim to tell "alternative facts" to the inventions of science fiction. The comparison won't work.  We fiction writers make up stuff. Some of it clearly impossible, some of it realistic, but none...
